conversation.label: Fitz:
conversation.name: Fitz
conversation.phrase: As I said before, this device has a high-frequency, fluctuating, sub-material compression.

conversation.label: Fitz:
conversation.name: Fitz
conversation.phrase: The 0-8-4 is fueled by Tesseract technology. Hydra. World War II. Captain America. It's full of lethal amounts of gamma radiation.

conversation.label: Coulson:
conversation.name: Coulson
conversation.phrase: No. He's saying it's much, much worse.

conversation-text:
Ward: Now, what was the problem?
Fitz: As I said before, this device has a high-frequency, fluctuating, sub-material compression.
Ward: Fitz. In English.
Fitz: The 0-8-4 is fueled by Tesseract technology. Hydra. World War II. Captain America. It's full of lethal amounts of gamma radiation.
Ward: Gamma... you're saying it's nuclear.
Coulson: No. He's saying it's much, much worse.
[everybody steps away from the 0-8-4]
